name: NPR
text:
California State University is requiring all students to take an ethnic studies or social justice course in order to graduate.

But some faculty oppose the broad measure because it does not ensure students take an actual ethnic studies course. 
https://t.co/7QO8twLqIv

name: NPR
text:
A Pittsburgh company won a lucrative federal contract to build a COVID-19 database and gather reams of COVID-19 data instead of the CDC. 

But the contract process was filled with irregularities, NPR found.
https://t.co/UeX4JguJzS

name: NPR
text: In an open letter, a coalition of doctors, health experts and teachers are calling on officials to step back from the push to reopen the economy, saying leaders need to "shut it down, start over" and "do it right."  https://t.co/xWqQXh1ddf
